item.title: The temporary traffic lights in at least one direction are not working., 13th July
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights near Anerley The Mitre bus stop B are not working. It is delaying traffic (and causing drivers to repeatedly sound their horns (üòµ‚Äçüí´) to 'encourage' the drivers of cars ahead of them to move forward). I would say that it is dangerous, as drivers of the cars waiting for the traffic lights to signal that it is safe to proceed are having to judge the safety for themselves while facing an unclear road ahead.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Weighton Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet
